full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 131 of 247 259 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross 1 Q. She took care of the horses; right? 2 A. Yes, she did. 3 Q. She took care of the other animals on the property? 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. This took a lot of Ghislaine's time and energy to do this job, didn't it? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And she had to travel to the properties from time to time to do this work; right? 8 A. That's correct. 9 Q. Now, I think in your testimony, you called her Epstein's number 2; right? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. But from your perspective, she was dealing with the aircraft and the properties; right? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. She wasn't dealing with Epstein's finances; right? 14 A. No, not the business side. It was Jeffery household personal. 15 Q. The reason why you call her number 2 is because she was generally overseeing the running of the households; right? 16 A. Correct. 17 Q. But as we said, she wasn't on site at each of these properties every single day running the day-to-day of these households? 18 19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011903

1 Q. She took care of the horses; right? 2 A. Yes, she did. 3 Q. She took care of the other animals on the property? 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. This took a lot of Ghislaine's time and energy to do this job, didn't it? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And she had to travel to the properties from time to time to do this work; right? 8 A. That's correct. 9 Q. Now, I think in your testimony, you called her Epstein's number 2; right? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. But from your perspective, she was dealing with the aircraft and the properties; right? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. She wasn't dealing with Epstein's finances; right? 14 A. No, not the business side. It was Jeffery household personal. 15 Q. The reason why you call her number 2 is because she was generally overseeing the running of the households; right? 16 A. Correct. 17 Q. But as we said, she wasn't on site at each of these properties every single day running the day-to-day of these households?
